info.author: Templarbit Inc.
info.description:
Instructions for deploying to pypi
==================================
Requirements
------------

* Python 2.7 or 3.4+
* tox 2.3+

Optional
--------
* wwtd (`gem install wwtd`)

Installation
------------

Install the requirements::

    $ pip install -r example/requirements.txt

Configuration
-------------
Make sure your `.pypirc` file is located in your home directory. It should contain the following:

```bash
index-servers =
pypi
pypitest
[pypi]
repository=https://upload.pypi.org/legacy/
username=templarbit
[pypitest]
repository=https://test.pypi.org/legacy/
username=templarbit
```

Deployment to testpypi and pypi
-------------------------------
Run tests:

```bash
$ tox
```
or if you've installed `wwtd`, run travis locally, which will run `tox` for you:
```bash
$ wwtd
```

Deploy to testpypi:

```bash
$ python setup.py sdist upload -r pypitest
```

Deploy to production pypi:
```bash
$ python setup.py sdist upload -r pypi
```
info.name: django-templarbit
info.summary: Templarbit protects Django applications from XSS attacks and other malicious activity.
